about.description:
TorchGeo is a PyTorch domain library, similar to torchvision, providing datasets, samplers, transforms, and pre-trained models specific to geospatial data.

The goal of this library is to make it simple

1. for machine learning experts to work with geospatial data, and
2. for remote sensing experts to explore machine learning solutions.
about.summary: TorchGeo: datasets, samplers, transforms, and pre-trained models for geospatial data

about.description:
TorchGeo is a PyTorch domain library, similar to torchvision, providing datasets, samplers, transforms, and pre-trained models specific to geospatial data.

The goal of this library is to make it simple

1. for machine learning experts to work with geospatial data, and
2. for remote sensing experts to explore machine learning solutions.
about.summary: TorchGeo: datasets, samplers, transforms, and pre-trained models for geospatial data

name: torchgeo
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "torchgeo" %}
{% set version = "0.5.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/torchgeo-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 5f86a34d18fe36eeb9146b057b21e5356252ef8ab6a9db33feebb120a01feff8

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python >=3.9
    - setuptools >=61
  run:
    - einops >=0.3
    - fiona >=1.8.19
    - kornia >=0.6.9
    - lightly >=1.4.4
    - lightning >=2
    - matplotlib-base >=3.3.3
    - numpy >=1.19.2
    - pandas >=1.1.3
    - pillow >=8
    - pyproj >=3
    - python >=3.9
    - pytorch >=1.12
    - rasterio >=1.2
    - rtree >=1
    - segmentation-models-pytorch >=0.2
    - shapely >=1.7.1
    - timm >=0.4.12
    - torchmetrics >=0.10
    - torchvision >=0.13

    # Needed by LightningCLI
    - jsonargparse >=4.18
    - typeshed-client >=2.1
test:
  imports:
    - torchgeo
    - torchgeo.datamodules
    - torchgeo.datasets
    - torchgeo.losses
    - torchgeo.models
    - torchgeo.samplers
    - torchgeo.trainers
    - torchgeo.transforms
  commands:
    - pip check
    - python -m torchgeo --help
    - torchgeo --help
  requires:
    - pip

about:
  home: https://github.com/microsoft/torchgeo
  doc_url: https://torchgeo.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/microsoft/torchgeo
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'TorchGeo: datasets, samplers, transforms, and pre-trained models for geospatial data'
  description: |
    TorchGeo is a PyTorch domain library, similar to torchvision, providing datasets, samplers, transforms, and pre-trained models specific to geospatial data.

    The goal of this library is to make it simple

    1. for machine learning experts to work with geospatial data, and
    2. for remote sensing experts to explore machine learning solutions.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - adamjstewart
    - calebrob6
    - nilsleh
